questions: Q. 1. Why did India adopt Multi-Party system ? [Board Term-II, 2016 Outside Delhi, Set- 1, 2, 3]
answers: Ans. India adopted Multi-Party System because :  India is a large country and has social and geographical diversities.  It is easy to absorb different diversities in a multiParty Systems.  ½ × 2 = 1

questions: Q. 2. Why is one party political system not considered a good democratic system ?
answers: Ans. Because one party system has no democratic option.
